text: Post-Internet art has its roots in the Fluxus movement of the 1960's.
Petra Cortwright was one of the first artist to utilize YouTube and ebooks as mediums of distribution.
Many artists, such as Cory Archangel, appropriate memes and files from online culture.
Mimicing documentaries, Hito Steyerl's video works tell us to become invisible, we must become smaller than a pixel.
